title: MDBX_PAGE_FULL when syncing Polygon mainnet
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2022.06.6-alpha-77240899

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : 7724089985bf9cb8bb7d1bde92892256a6af859f

#### Expected behaviour
Move to the next  sync stage (14)

#### Actual behaviour
Restarts current stage 13 (LogIndex 1/2) after failing LogIndex 2/2

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
./erigon --chain=bor-mainnet --bor.heimdall=https://heimdall.api.matic.network --db.pagesize 64kb --snapshots=true --datadir=/home/erigon/.local/share/erigon/ --ethash.dagdir=/home/erigon/.local/share/ethash/ --metrics --port="31303" --pprof.addr="0.0.0.0" --pprof.port="6060" --private.api.addr="0.0.0.0:9090" --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.port=8547 --http.api=eth,debug,net,web3,trace --trace.maxtraces=10000

#### Backtrace

The data directory is currently 3174165492 bytes

````
[INFO] [07-14|04:49:38.412] [13/16 LogIndex] etl: temp files removed total size=1.2GB                      
[EROR] [07-14|04:49:41.258] Staged Sync                              err="[13/16 LogIndex] 13/16 LogIndex: put: k=311434160d7537be358930def317afb606c0d737017f9bcb, table: LogAddressIndex, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDBX_PAGE_FULL: Internal erro
r - Page has no more space"                                                                                            
[INFO] [07-14|04:50:05.911] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=100                             
[INFO] [07-14|04:50:12.294] [13/16 LogIndex] Progress                number=7619791 alloc=4.3GB sys=12.0GB 
[INFO] [07-14|04:50:42.167] [13/16 LogIndex] Progress                number=8332057 alloc=5.2GB sys=12.0GB
````

It was about 3.1 TB yesterday, right now in the process it is 2.6TB (at block 28970000 of LogIndex 1/2).

I got this error during my first sync attempt but thought I may have omitted `db.pagesize` during initialization. This time around I'm 100% certain it was there from the first run.

@AskAlexSharov, I've received a different error during the same stage transition. mdbx.dat is 3134732012 kb

```
[INFO] [07-17|16:13:04.605] [13/16 LogIndex] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=LogTopicIndex current key=e6f99566... alloc=6.3GB sys=11.4GB                                                                                                         
[INFO] [07-17|16:13:06.966] [txpool] stat                            block=0 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=5.7GB sys=11.4GB                                                                                                       
[INFO] [07-17|16:13:34.619] [13/16 LogIndex] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=LogTopicIndex current key=f658eab3... alloc=6.2GB sys=11.4GB
```

hi. here is branch with fix: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/pull/4847
This appears to be fixed and has moved on to the next stages. Currently, approx 3.7TB, thank you!!
